channel.title: Shallow Brook Software
channel.description: Recent content on Shallow Brook Software

item.title: Shallow Brook Software
item.description: Intro Welcome to Shallow Brook Software! My name is Andrew Dailey and I’m a software hobbyist in Des Moines, Iowa, USA. This website is a simple platform for me to document the things I do and the thoughts I have. I also plan to utilize this as a portfolio for projects that I deem complete and worth showcasing. About the name The name of this site is an homage to the old phrase “A shallow brook babbles the loudest”.
